definition: abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: The quartz sandstone appears in the upper member of Yangzhuang Formation as thin-bedded strata with double peaks of grain size distribution.
sentences.chinese: 石英砂岩呈薄层出现在杨庄组上部，具双众数结构。

sentences.english: Finally, the boundary of the equilibrium distribution is derived.
sentences.chinese: 研究了平稳分布的众数与边界关系。

sentences.english: The mode is that value that is repeated most often in the data set.
sentences.chinese: 众数是资料中重复出现次数最多的那个数值。

sentences.english: This distribution, then, has two modes called a bimodal distribution .
sentences.chinese: 这种分布有两个众数，叫做双峰分布。

sentences.english: And the other is it will lost the efficacy when there are more than two modes.
sentences.chinese: 第二，在存有多个众数时规则失效。

sentences.english: The mode is the most frequently occurring value of a data distribution.
sentences.chinese: 众数是在一个数据分布中最频繁出现的值。

definition: composite number (i.e. not prime, has a factorization)
small figure/small amount/the part of a number to the right of the decimal point (or radix point)/fractional part of a number/number between 0 and 1/decimal fraction
